title: Torrent Finder Free v1.0.7 Android App (Updated 24th May, 2015)
description:
Version: 1.0.7 (released on 24th May, 2015)

What's New?
- Performance has been improved considerably
- Welcome Screen layout has been fixed for small screen devices

Join the discussion on our Facebook pageand get the latest information about the app.
Watch app's demo videoor read more about the app in this blog

Short description:
Search, Download and Share Torrents in ThePirateBay, Kickass and Fenopy

Long Description:

Features:
- Automatic secure proxy selection for ThePirateBay, Kickass and Fenopy
- Easy access to 'Featured' or 'Popular' Torrents in various categories
- Search for Torrents
- Filter search results
- Sort search results based on seeders, leechers, size, upload time, etc
- Share Torrent with friends
- Read up-loader's comments (if present)
- Read user comments (if present)
- See IMDB rating (if present)
- Watch YouTube Trailer (if present)
- See screenshots (if present)
- And much more

What this app, IS?
This app helps you to find Torrents.
You can filter and/or sort search results based on size, quality, number of seeders, leechers, etc parameters.
The Torrent file can be downloaded and can even be shared. To share a Torrent, long press a Torrent search result or use the share option in 'Action bar', in Torrent Details screen.
 
What this app is, NOT?
A 'Torrent Client'.
You need to install third party 'Torrent Client' app to use the instant file download feature (magnetic link) or to download the actual data using torrent file.

Humble request to users:
Email me your suggestions at
Tell me what you like and don't like about the app.
What else you think the app should do to make it more useful to you. I am waiting :)
Please rate and write a review for the app.

I am the developer of this app. My app was unpublished from Google Play Store because Google thinks it promotes piracy, but this did not happen before the app received 30,000+ installs
